channel.title: Need help
channel.description: So i recently added the squeal of fortune to my RSPS but im with 3 problems the 1st one when i click on the X to close the small icon it says the message but the icon stays there the 2nd one i can't seem to find a way to make a ;;removespins command and the 3rd one i wanted to make it give like 2 daily spins overwriting the previous ones (like rs) but i have no ideia how to do it can anyone help me please. Thanks
